titleStmt.title: Doctor Hill's funeral-sermon. Or a nevv-yeers-gift to all the clergie. Daynus, the reviving feet fo the witnesses past and to come, to shew the day and yeer of the Lord, and his time accepted.
titleStmt.author: Hesselwood, Henry.

publicationStmt.publisher: And are to be sold by Richard Moon at the the seven stars in Pauls Church-yard.,

notesStmt.note: The second part starts with a new register on p.1, has caption-title: The second part of D. Hils funeral-sermon, with his apollation to priests and people. By me Henry Hasselwood and running title: The second part of Dr. Hill's funeral-sermon.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the the seven stars in Pauls Church-yard.
